NoDocumented: This class has no documented members.

nil.Description: Represents the absence of a value.

boolean.Description: A value that can be either true or false.

function.Description: A block of code that can be called to perform a task.

Rotoris.Environment.Description: Provides information about the current script's execution environment.
Rotoris.Environment.ModuleName: The name of the primary module currently running.

Rotoris.Async.Description: Represents an asynchronous operation that may not complete immediately.
Rotoris.Async.wait: Waits for the asynchronous operation to complete and returns the result.
Rotoris.Async.match: Matches the result of the asynchronous operation, executing a handler for success or failure. Can time out.

Rotoris.Result.Description: Represents the result of an operation that can either succeed (Ok) or fail (Err).
Rotoris.Result.is_ok: Returns true if the result is Ok.
Rotoris.Result.is_err: Returns true if the result is Err.
Rotoris.Result.ok: Returns the value if the result is Ok, otherwise nil.
Rotoris.Result.err: Returns the error message if the result is Err, otherwise nil.
Rotoris.Result.unwrap: Returns the value if the result is Ok, otherwise throws an error.
Rotoris.Result.match: Executes a handler based on whether the result is Ok or Err.

MatchHandlers.Description: A table of functions to handle the Ok and Err cases of a Result.
MatchHandlers.Ok: Function to execute if the result is Ok. Receives the success value.
MatchHandlers.Err: Function to execute if the result is Err. Receives the error message.

Rotoris.LuaAudio.Description: Provides functions to control audio on the system, including application sessions and microphones.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.get_sessions: Retrieves a list of all active audio sessions.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.increase_volume: Increases the volume of a specific session or the master volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.set_volume: Sets the volume of a specific session.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.decrease_volume: Decreases the volume of a specific session or the master volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.get_current_volume: Gets the current volume of a specific session or the master volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.toggle_mute: Toggles mute for a specific session or the master volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.is_muted: Checks if a specific session or the master volume is muted.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.get_mic_sessions: Retrieves a list of all active microphone sessions.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.increase_mic_volume: Increases the volume of a specific microphone or the master microphone volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.set_mic_volume: Sets the volume of a specific microphone.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.decrease_mic_volume: Decreases the volume of a specific microphone or the master microphone volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.get_mic_volume: Gets the current volume of a specific microphone or the master microphone volume.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.toggle_mic_mute: Toggles mute for a specific microphone or the master microphone.
Rotoris.LuaAudio.is_mic_muted: Checks if a specific microphone or the master microphone is muted.

ProcessAudioSession.Description: Represents an audio session for a specific process.
ProcessAudioSession.SessionId: The unique identifier for the audio session.
ProcessAudioSession.ProcessName: The name of the process associated with the audio session.

MicrophoneSession.SessionId: The unique identifier for the microphone session.
MicrophoneSession.FriendlyName: The display name of the microphone.

Rotoris.LuaCache.Description: A simple key-value store for caching data within a script's lifetime.
Rotoris.LuaCache.set: Stores a value in the cache with a given key.
Rotoris.LuaCache.get: Retrieves a value from the cache by its key.
Rotoris.LuaCache.remove: Removes a value from the cache by its key.
Rotoris.LuaCache.exists: Checks if a key exists in the cache.
Rotoris.LuaCache.clear: Clears all items from the cache.
Rotoris.LuaCache.exclusive: Executes a function with exclusive access to the cache, preventing race conditions.

Rotoris.LuaCanvas.Description: Provides a drawing surface for creating custom UI elements.
Rotoris.LuaCanvas.draw: Starts a drawing session with the provided drawing context.
Rotoris.LuaCanvas.set_size: Sets the size of the canvas.

DrawContext.Description: Defines the drawing logic for a canvas, including initialization and update handlers.

State.Description: Represents the state maintained between draw calls.

DrawContext.OnInit: A function called once to initialize the drawing state.
DrawContext.OnUpdate: A function called on each frame to update the drawing.

CanvasContext.Description: The context for drawing on a canvas, providing drawing primitives and state management.
CanvasContext.clear: Clears the canvas with an optional background color.
CanvasContext.set_paint: Sets the current paint for subsequent drawing operations.
CanvasContext.draw_line: Draws a line between two points.
CanvasContext.draw_text: Draws text at a specified position.
CanvasContext.measure_text: Measures the bounding box of a string of text.
CanvasContext.create_path: Creates a new path object for complex shapes.
CanvasContext.draw_path: Draws a path defined by a series of actions.
CanvasContext.translate: Moves the origin of the canvas.
CanvasContext.restore: Restores the previously saved canvas state.
CanvasContext.delay: Pauses the drawing for a specified duration.
CanvasContext.done: Indicates that the drawing is complete.

Args.Description: Arguments passed to the canvas update function.
Args.DeltaTime: The time elapsed since the last frame.

RectangleRadiiOptions.Description: Options for drawing a rectangle with individual corner radii.
RectangleRadiiOptions.RadiusX: The horizontal radius for the corners.
RectangleRadiiOptions.RadiusY: The vertical radius for the corners.

CanvasPath.Description: Represents a geometric path that can be drawn on the canvas.
CanvasPath.move_to: Moves the current point of the path to a new location.
CanvasPath.line_to: Adds a line from the current point to a new point.
CanvasPath.close: Closes the path by connecting the last point to the first.
CanvasPath.add_rect: Adds a rectangle to the path.
CanvasPath.add_circle: Adds a circle to the path.
CanvasPath.add_arc: Adds an arc to the path.
CanvasPath.add_oval: Adds an oval to the path.
CanvasPath.add_path: Adds another path to this path.
CanvasPath.add_path_reverse: Adds another path in reverse to this path.
CanvasPath.add_poly: Adds a polygon to the path.
CanvasPath.add_round_rect: Adds a rounded rectangle to the path.
CanvasPath.arc_to: Adds an arc to the path, defined by two points and a radius.
CanvasPath.set_fill_type: Sets the fill type of the path.
CanvasPath.get_fill_type: Gets the fill type of the path.
CanvasPath.get: Gets the underlying SkiaSharp path object.

FontCache.load_from_file: Loads a font from a file.
FontCache.get: Gets a font by family name and size.
FontCache.dispose_by_family: Disposes of all fonts in a family.

ImageCache.load_bytes: Loads an image from a byte array.
ImageCache.get: Gets an image by its path.
ImageCache.load: Loads an image from a file path.

Editor.Description: Provides methods to edit a paint object.
Editor.set_color: Sets the color of the paint.
Editor.set_style: Sets the style of the paint (fill, stroke).

Rotoris.LuaFileSystem.Description: Provides functions for interacting with the file system.
Rotoris.LuaFileSystem.read_file: Reads the content of a file as a string.
Rotoris.LuaFileSystem.read_file_bytes: Reads the content of a file as a byte array.
Rotoris.LuaFileSystem.write_file: Writes a string to a file.
Rotoris.LuaFileSystem.write_file_bytes: Writes a byte array to a file.

Rotoris.LuaHID.Description: Provides functions for simulating Human Interface Device (HID) input, like keyboard and mouse.
Rotoris.LuaHID.key_press: Simulates a key press (down and up).
Rotoris.LuaHID.mouse_move: Moves the mouse cursor by a given delta.

Rotoris.LuaLog.print: Prints a message to the log.
Rotoris.LuaLog.println: Prints a message to the log followed by a new line.

Rotoris.LuaMedia.Description: Provides functions for controlling media playback.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.get_session_ids: Gets the IDs of all active media sessions.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.get_current_session_id: Gets the ID of the current media session.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.get_media_timeline: Gets the timeline of the current media.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.get_playback_status: Gets the playback status (e.g., playing, paused).
Rotoris.LuaMedia.is_playing: Checks if media is currently playing.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.get_media_properties_async: Asynchronously gets the properties of the current media.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.play_or_pause_async: Asynchronously toggles between play and pause.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.skip_next_async: Asynchronously skips to the next track.
Rotoris.LuaMedia.skip_previous_async: Asynchronously skips to the previous track.

Rotoris.MediaTimeline.Description: Represents the timeline of a media item.
Rotoris.MediaTimeline.StartTime: The start time of the media.
Rotoris.MediaTimeline.EndTime: The end time of the media.
Rotoris.MediaTimeline.Position: The current position in the media.

Rotoris.MediaProperties.Description: Represents the properties of a media item.
Rotoris.MediaProperties.Title: The title of the media.
Rotoris.MediaProperties.Subtitle: The subtitle of the media.
Rotoris.MediaProperties.AlbumArtist: The album artist of the media.
Rotoris.MediaProperties.AlbumTitle: The album title of the media.
Rotoris.MediaProperties.AlbumTrackCount: The total number of tracks in the album.
Rotoris.MediaProperties.Thumbnail: The thumbnail image of the media.

Rotoris.MediaImage.Description: Represents an image associated with a media item.
Rotoris.MediaImage.ContentType: The content type of the image (e.g., 'image/jpeg').
Rotoris.MediaImage.ImageData: The raw image data as a byte array.

Rotoris.LuaMenu.Description: Provides functions for creating and managing radial menus.
Rotoris.LuaMenu.open_menu: Opens a menu by its name.
Rotoris.LuaMenu.set_options: Sets the options for the current menu.
Rotoris.LuaMenu.set_size: Sets the size of the menu.
Rotoris.LuaMenu.set_temporary_scroll: Sets a temporary scroll behavior for the menu.
Rotoris.LuaMenu.print_message: Prints a message on the screen.

TemporaryScroll.IdleTimeout: Timeout in milliseconds before the temporary scroll is deactivated.
TemporaryScroll.ClockwiseModuleName: The name of the module to execute on clockwise scroll.
TemporaryScroll.CounterclockwiseModuleName: The name of the module to execute on counter-clockwise scroll.
TemporaryScroll.ClickModuleName: The name of the module to execute on click.
TemporaryScroll.TimeoutModuleName: The name of the module to execute on timeout.

MenuEditor.Description: A helper for building menu options.
MenuEditor.add_option: Adds an option to the menu.
MenuEditor.to_json: Converts the menu to its JSON representation.

Rotoris.LuaSystem.open: Opens a file or URL with the default application.

Rotoris.LuaWindows.Description: Provides functions for interacting with windows.
Rotoris.LuaWindows.focus_window: Focuses a window by its title.
Rotoris.LuaWindows.get_active_window_title: Gets the title of the currently active window.
Rotoris.LuaWindows.get_window_size: Gets the size and position of a window.
Rotoris.LuaWindows.get_windows: Gets a list of all open window titles.
Rotoris.LuaWindows.find_window_regex: Finds a window by a regular expression matching its title.

WindowSize.Description: Represents the size and position of a window.
WindowSize.Top: The top coordinate of the window.
WindowSize.Left: The left coordinate of the window.
WindowSize.Right: The right coordinate of the window.
WindowSize.Bottom: The bottom coordinate of the window.
